title: Analyst Looking to Work with Players/Teams
body:
Hello,

My name is Chavez (**REF5ESH**) and I am interested in assisting teams and/or players as an analyst. Last year I was very active, working with high-level soloQ teams to newly formed ones looking to climb and improve. I also worked with multiple players from a wide range of ranks, assisting them with things like lane matchups, teamfighting and decision-making. I have been able to deliver feedback in both written form through documents and verbally through Skype or Discord (or a combination of both).

For me, this comes from a passion of the game and eagerness to see others improve. At the same time i am always looking to improve my own skillset, and thrive on testing myself and learning from others.

Whether you're a Bronze player looking to climb to Silver, or an amateur team wanting to make the pro circuit, contact me here or in-game (**REF5ESH**) if you are interested!

replies.body: I watch games more than I play, if rank is that important to you.
You have played 150 games with a 50% win rate you are where you belong lol
In terms of payment, the first couple of sessions are free! We can negotiate a price if you want to continue with further sessions.
